list.name: Default
list.comment:
Implement correlation plots
Resolve MMPP-753
* add correlation plots from TMVA

task.summary: Default task
implement FileHandle.open and corresponding test for failure
implement further FileHandle functionality
implement getObjectByName and corresponding test; add ObjectHandle

add base package

commit all changes before rebase
